hero.name: Florian Hohenleitner
hero.cta: Listen to Grow with the Flo

about.title: About Flo
about.description: Florian is a passionate coach and podcast host helping creatives and professionals unlock their flow, resilience, and purpose. He believes growth is best achieved together, and his work is dedicated to building connection and transformation for all.

livingWithEase.title: Living with Ease
livingWithEase.subtitle: Anxiety Program
livingWithEase.description: Transform your relationship with anxiety and discover tools for lasting peace and confidence.

authenticMan.title: Becoming the Authentic Man
authenticMan.subtitle: Men's Development Program
authenticMan.description: A journey of self-discovery to embrace your true masculinity and live with purpose and integrity.

connection.title: Connection & Relationships
connection.subtitle: Relationship Coaching
connection.description: Build deeper, more meaningful connections and transform your relationships with others and yourself.

mac.title: Mediterranean Acro Convention
mac.description: Join us for an unforgettable week of acro yoga, personal growth, and community connection on the beautiful Mediterranean coast.

newsletter.title: Stay Connected
newsletter.description: Join our community of growth-minded individuals and get weekly insights delivered to your inbox.
